name: Run An Empire - The Strategy Running Game
name_original: Run An Empire - The Strategy Running Game
description:
Run An Empire is a strategy running game that takes place in the real world around you. Conquer lands in the name of your empire by running (or jogging or walking) around them.

Unleash your inner warrior in a race against friends and neighbours to rule the greatest empire of all time! Run An Empire combines the careful planning of a strategy game with physical location and movement.

FEATURES
- Capture unclaimed lands by running around them
- Expand your borders (and your gold stores) by raiding neighbouring territories
- Reinforce your empire against local adversaries
- Put your territories to work and harvest coins from the land
- Design your own heraldic shield
- Keep a log of all your raiding runs

Run An Empire is not just for gifted athletes. Most importantly, strategy and determination are needed to be victorious.

MEDIA RESPONSE
Fast Company: “Run An Empire challenges you to conquer territory and defend it from rivals, rather like the classic strategy game Risk.”

Polygon: “Run An Empire offers mobile gamers the opportunity to turn their local neighborhood into their own fiefdom.”

Runner’s World: “Level up your running with a new app that brings tactical gaming to the real world.”

AVAILABILITY
This version is currently for New Zealand and United Kingdom

REQUIREMENTS
- Please note that iPhone 4s is not supported
- A network connection and GPS are required to play
- Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life

SUPPORT
Are you having issues with the game? Visit http://runanempire.zendesk.com/hc/en-us for help
